title: Instalocker
body:
This guy instalocked jungle. (the link shows the screenshot)
The reason I'm posting this is not only cuz he instalocked,but also due to the fact that riot does not take in reports seriously regarding people who instalock.

replies.body:
You cant report those who insta lock.
There is nothing against it.

You can only report if abuse/harassment occurred.
(Even then a mute/report is usually what everyones gonna say)

Also, I'm not sure if this counts as name and shaming?
As no one here has done anything wrong, but to be safe I would black out his name anyway and re-upload the link.
